item.title: Swap Two Numbers in C
item.description: Code below swaps two numbers without using a third variable {% highlight c linenos %} include<stdio.h> int swap(int* a, int *b){ // swapping values using match trick *a = *a + *b; *b = *a - *b; *a = *a - *b; return 0; } int main(){ int a, b; printf(“Enter two numbers”); scanf("%d %d", &a, &b); printf(“a=%d, b=%d”, a, b); swap(&a, &b); printf(“a=%d, b=%d”, a, b); return 0; } {% endhighlight %}
